text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text:
Together we'll run for our dream! ♪ We'll keep trying, and wring out 
all our strength! ♪

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Wow, that was amazing! Both the race and the concert! My heart's still pounding!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: I know, I know! And the best part of all was…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text:
Teio! 
McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Did you see Teio's final sprint? Her power is incredible! She's second 
to none!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
But McQueen had perfect pacing! She stays calm and composed all 
the way to the finish line. No one else can compare!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Teio!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Well, did you see the way Teio's cute ponytail flutters in the wind as 
she runs?!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, I was too busy staring at McQueen's beautiful locks gleaming in 
the sunlight!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: Grr…

text_block_list.name: Passerby
text_block_list.text: Hehe, look at those girls playing together. How adorable.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Ahem. Anyway, let's just agree that they were both incredible…

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Hehe. Yes! Both of them were really cool! How could they not be?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Um… Aaand Tokai Teio makes her move! She puts on a burst of speed 
to chase down Mejiro McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Hehe. Is that an impression of the caster?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Yep! It's a little off though, don't you think? Doesn't quite do Teio 
justice.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
But we've only just joined the academy. There's so much to learn! I'm 
gonna become just like Teio and my dad!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Your father… Oh, of course—he's a kind man who everyone in town 
loves, isn't he?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, thanks for saying that. Yeah, I really admire my dad. He always 
puts other people's happiness first!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Wherever he goes, he's always surrounded by smiles. That's why I 
wanna do the same and make people smile with my running!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Just like Teio does too! I'm sure it'll make my mom happy as well!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Though my reason's not exactly super deep like yours, Dia!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
I mean, you joined Tracen Academy to fulfill your family's wish, didn't 
you?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Hmm, not quite. My family's wish—for me to win G1 races—is actually my dream too.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
I was born thanks to the hopes and dreams of many people—my 
mother, my father, and everyone connected to our business.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
I want to meet their expectations and show everyone my own unique 
style of running… just like McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: I see! Well, I know you'll be able to make your dream come true!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
You too, Kita! You'll make everyone smile—I'm sure of it! That's one 
of your strengths, after all!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: Hehe. ♪
Ding-dong, bing-bong…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Wait, that chime… Oh no! It's almost curfew! We have to hurry back to 
the dorm!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
No need to panic. I'll just call my driver… Oh, I don't have my cell 
phone.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Then let's take a taxi… Um, you don't happen to have my wallet, do 
you, Kita?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Nope, and I don't have any money on me either! We'll just have to 
make a run for it! C'mooon!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume's Journal
text_block_list.text: "I messed up again today. Why does this always happen to me? Sigh…"

text_block_list.name: Umamusume's Journal
text_block_list.text: "But it's okay! I'll have another chance with my next race. I'll push myself harder and definitely win the next one!"
The next day…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Phew, we're finally done. This place is way too huge for just two people to clean.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha… Well, it was the dorm leader's decision, so what could we 
do?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
"Quite brazen of you to break dorm curfew so soon after entering the 
academy. As a tribute to your bravery, I'll reward you both with a 
week's worth of cleaning duty."

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, is that your impression of the dorm leader yesterday? You're 
really good at impersonations, Kita!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe. I was so bummed out that it stuck in my head. But whatever! 
Cleaning duty just feels like another part of school life!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Plus, you're here with me, Dia!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Huh? What about it?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Anything's fun when you're with your best friend! I can't wait for us to 
go running together too!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: …Yeah. I feel the same way. But—
WAAAAAH!
